articles.description: Browns quarterback Deshaun Watson only played one series in Friday night's preseason game, but on that series he ran the ball three times for 20 yards.
articles.content: Browns quarterback Deshaun Watson only played one series in Friday nights preseason game, but on that series he ran the ball three times for 20 yards. Which raised questions about whether it makes se… [+802 chars]
